pullRequest.title: made ContentAssistFragment2 better customizable
pullRequest.bodyText:
made ContentAssistFragment2 better customizable
Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: the current api here really is bad and i did not want to break. what do you think?
While we are at it: does it make sense to extract methods getAssignments and getRemainingRules?
I'd like to have a better name for remainingRules, maybe just rules or rulesToComplete ? Same for the method above.
